articles.description: Former England captain Nasser Hussain has explained the 'main reason' behind India beating England in the 2nd Test in Chennai.
articles.content: India's defeat over England by a record 317 runs the biggest in terms of runs will go down in history as one of the home team's more famous wins. Not only because they were coming off a 227-run defea… [+2425 chars]

articles.title: 'Will be pretty cool': Glenn Maxwell eager to bat alongside his 'idol' at Royal Challengers Bangalore - Hindustan Times
articles.description: IPL 2021: Glenn Maxwell has revealed he wouldn't mind going down south and join Royal Challengers Bangalore, where he can play with his 'idol'.
articles.content: Glenn Maxwell, who was released by Punjab Kings (formerly Kings XI Punjab) after spending several seasons with the franchise has his eyes set on the IPL auction. Maxwell has set his base price at 2 c… [+2431 chars]
